rooms.description: The entrance foyer features traditional Chettinad motifs and a central open space with floor-to-ceiling windows to enhance natural light. Vastu-aligned positioning ensures positive energy flow.

An expansive living area integrated with the open-plan kitchen, featuring Chettinad-style woodwork and modern fixtures. Floor-to-ceiling windows provide ample natural light while enhancing spatial openness.

The master bedroom is designed with a dedicated ensuite bathroom and an adjoining closet space, incorporating traditional Chettinad architectural elements and floor-to-ceiling windows to ensure a peaceful ambiance.
A secondary bedroom designed in line with local building norms and Vastu principles, featuring adequate ventilation through strategically placed openings.

The open-plan kitchen is integrated within the living area, incorporating modern appliances while reflecting Chettinad design aesthetics. The design ensures proper ventilation and natural light through floor-to-ceiling windows.

details.description: Large, unobstructed windows to maximize natural lighting as per Chettinad design aesthetics and Vastu principles.
Ensures an inviting entry while aligning with local architectural style.
